salaryExpectations: LKR 50,000 (Junior Draughtsman) to LKR 250,000+ (Chief Draughtsman/BIM Manager) per month.
futureOutlook: The role is evolving from 2D drafting to 3D modeling. Professionals who master Building Information Modeling (BIM) software like Revit are in much higher demand and can command better salaries. The role is being elevated from a drafter to a 'BIM Modeler' or 'Digital Engineer', which is a crucial part of the modern construction process.
